message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're being a bit greedy, Alice! I'll give you a small chance to get more, but I'm keeping most of the pie.
You're right, I was being a bit greedy. But I'm not willing to accept such a low offer. I want a better split.
Let's split it down the middle, Bob. It's a fair deal, don't you think?
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking most of the cash.
You're being ruthless, Bob! I'm not going to accept such a small consolation prize. I want a better deal.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Bob. I'm taking a bigger share this time.
You're getting a bit too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
